abstract: For all the emotion at the end of the Raj Rajaratnam insider trading trial, the jury was clear-eyed and confident about its decision to convict him on all counts, one juror said.
snippet: For all the emotion at the end of the Raj Rajaratnam insider trading trial, the jury was clear-eyed and confident about its decision to convict him on all counts, one juror said.
lead_paragraph: Andrew Burton/Getty ImagesRaj Rajaratnam leaving federal court after his conviction.

headline.main: Stack of Evidence Sealed Galleon Case, Juror Says

byline.original: By Evelyn M. Rusli and Peter Lattman
